sentences: SBI Chair Liana Bratasida (Indonesia) suggested leaving the sub-item on information contained in non-Annex I national communications in abeyance.
Parties agreed and adopted the agenda and organization of work (FCCC/SBI/2009/9).
The SBI elected Samuel Ortiz Basualdo (Argentina) as Vice-Chair and Kadio Ahossane (Côte d Ivoire) as Rapporteur.
